entries.description: A grassy plain of rolling hills and rivers, rising to barely-visible mountains in the distance
Ageless grey stone ruins, punctuated by standing pillars and strange round gateways
A field of erratic, massive boulders at the foot of a flat-topped granite crag
The blasphemous, forgotten halls of a serpent-made underground labyrinth
Windswept dunes above a crashing shore, broken only by the masts of mist-hidden shipwrecks
Deep drifts and hard packed snow on a high, rocky ledge
Narrow, colossal canyons cut with oversized doorways and hidden grottoes
A forgotten, soggy, sagging dock at the dark-watered shore
High-arched sea caves below the towers and streets of castle city-state
A thatched village surrounding a rocky river
Among the towering buttresses and arches of an abandoned abbey high in the mountains
A valley of dense-packed foliage and underbrush, all choked in white-flowered vines
The primordial curved sandstone of wind-hewn rock formations in sweltering heat
'Tween the scattered round huts of a nomadic traders' guild
At the feet of towering humanoid statues, their features scoured away by ages
A plateau of tusk-braced long halls and spiked barricades...the work of Hill men
On a precipice of ragged igneous rock above a river of gooey orange magma flowing in a river of death
Among the silent, ghostly doorways of a long dead town
In the tangled, baffling hustle of a port city...buffeted by merchants, drunks, and wenches
At the black-walled immensity of some evil fortress, far above the clouds and peaks
Among the many-armed colossi of a vine-wrapped Zurin temple
A cloud of vapor and breathable gas in space, punctuated by floating trees and globs of water
The massive hallways and bulkheads of a derelict space hulk
The crater-scarred vacuum of a planet-fragment, skewered with huge metal girders and twisted wreckage
The gold-domed utopia of a megacity, hovering above the clouds on silent grav engines
In a sea of glowing gas and proto-stars, far beyond the gleam of the nearest visible sun
An expanse of mind-crushing nothingness between the galaxies
The bridge of a barely functional freighter ship
A dizzying chamber housing the rune-scribed hyperdrive of some long-lost race
An endless vertical tube lined with weird fluid-filled gelatinous pods
The innards of a planet-sized computer
Splintering canyons and crumbling peaks on a seismic ice moon
The immense, brass-winged balustrades of an Imperium Doom Hall
A bizarre, inverted, twisted alien husk tumbling through deep space in a cloud of red dust
A hive-carved mountain range of nests and tunnels
The endless thunderstorms in the upper atmosphere of an ocean giant
A molten hellscape of liquid stone at the center of a dense gas megaplanet
On the seething spiral-etched surface of the Devourer itself
In the featureless stone tunnel-ways of a Xevosian undershrine
Among the massive heads and effigies of a basalt necropolis in the eerie light of a shatterstar
A rickety, rotted old bridge over a swampy mire...weird, carnivorous vines stir in the muck
A huge, fortified wall of stone and spikes from some long lost war
Three ravenous Ogres, out hunting for meat, treasure, or something to torture
A ragtag bunch of Gerblin road-tollers and their poorly made barricade
Krod the Butcher! You killed his cousin, and he wants payback. You didn't kill his cousin?
A sequence of devious floor traps, dart launchers, poison gas, and bladed pendula
A crazed Brain Horror and its legion of mutated Bog folk
A rune-locked door of the ancients, ever watched by the ghosts of their faithful
An impossible climb down, and over, and through
The endless bombardments of siege engines and fire-hurlers
The endless fury of Durax, the spawn of Hydranax, a Black Drake
An army of skeletal warriors marching forever in search of futile revenge
The trampling madness of the Agnar riders and their shamanic Chief
An endless, tangled dark of dead trees and scorched thorn bushes
A roving pack of Shadow Lashers, driven wild by some unseen plague or sickness
A smoke-choked mass of spinning spikes and toothed cogs, all churning with power
A pitch black chamber orbited by Slime Cubes and the animated remains of their prisoners
A vast, open chasm of swirling mist and howling voices
The crushing path of destruction wrought by a Behemoth from outer space
An entire tribe of Flaming Skulls, gathered by some black spell or horrid rite
The countless legion of three-eyed Imperium automatons
A squad of augmented, undead Imperium Raiders in full power armor
A spinning oak: a gravity-defying radial tree the size of a small moon, hovering impossibly in your path
The misguided rage of a malfunctioning WarBot, built to incredible size with salvaged weapons
A space-faring Gargoleth, hybridized with a star drive and weapon systems
A high-power energy field, preserved by a four-piece, rune-encrypted crystal lock
The explosive waves of hellfire emitted from a dying star
A hive of Bore Worms, driven to murderous aggression by a devilish, disembodied Brain
Space Cannibals! The monsters have a Ravager galleon and mean to make dinner of you all!
A highly trained unit of Reptoid Assassins employing outlawed stealth tech
A mote of the dead...one vast, twisting river of corpses coiling through low gravity
Sabotage! Xill drill bombs tear the place to shreds, blocking your way
A shapeless, faceless automated sentinel from a lost epoch
The seemingly invincible, ever-changing mind powers of a spoiled boy prince
The indomitable advance of a planet-eater
A series of unexplained malfunctions and systems failures wreaking havoc
The suicidal members of a cult whose aim is to summon the Devourer
A drug crazed lunatic called Krome, rampaging in a supermodified Imperium Fighter
The swarming hellions of a sun scorched world, who navigate only by sound
A baffling series of dimension doorways, becoming more unstable by the moment
Escape the relentless pursuit of the Red Mage, who made you this way in the Grey Hill fire
Destroy the eldritch green gem that drives the Ape men mad with frenzy
Send the Serpent-Lich, Vexx, back to his dusty tomb before he reaches full power
Deliver the Royal Decree of King Henryk to the ship builders of Gilhelm
Rescue Princess Arana
Cripple the Khettish siege force before they reach their fortifications
Purify the tomb of Lion Sword with a bolt of elusive red lightning
Recover the most legendary weapon in Alfheim: Angrid, the Lawgiver
Solve the gloomy curse on Gwadan's folk, putting their ghosts to rest at last
Kill the abomination called Agolath, a hybrid monstrosity of the under realm
Follow the shaman's map to the treasure of Count Undin, and earn a king's fortune!
Garfest! Make it to the Khyber peaks before Garfest ends in a ruckus of foam and laughter
Earn a place in the ranks of the Iron Knights by passing their infamous trials
Seal the magic gate that holds the Black Castle imprisoned, before Azael's hordes can escape
Heal the temporal rift slowly destroying the Primordius
Reset the cosmic clock on Aphos before the entire island sinks into the abyss
Dare the depths of Daggun's grave, and seal that watery tomb forever
Assassins! Eliminate Kirash the Knife and his mock-court of thugs and murderers
Realign the glow-stones of Duros, and end the tremors that threaten the under mountain
Set sky sails for the Maelstrom Watch, and aid the monks in their ritual before the storm tears reality apart
Stop, strip, and salvage an Imperium Broadsword-class cruiser
Survive a crash landing on a Xill planet fragment
Repair a damaged power station on the Psyker frontier
Set massive terraformers in motion on a remote Primal world before it tears itself apart
Lizards! Find a way to halt a Reptoid invasion fleet before it gains any more momentum
Retrieve the plans to a Psyker doomsday weapon that utilizes mind control
Explore an uncharted sector of space for clues to stop the Devourer
Locate and return a missing Zurin freighter carrying an experimental hyperdrive
Eliminate Hal Dagger and his gang of space junkies before they kill the Yrin Emperor's daughter
Find a way off a primitive backwater planet
Attune to the largest YOG crystal fragment ever found
Slay a gargantuan Bugbeast and claim mining rights on the corpse
Track a mysterious transmission claiming the Imperium is gathering to full strength
Fulfill a lucrative contract to bring in the Xill pirate Skall Grick...dead or alive
Transport a cluster of occupied hypersleep pods to a classified destination, but do NOT wake them up
Gather scientific data on an imploding star in a remote corner of space, beyond any comms
Travel back in time to find clues on the Devourer's origin
Wage a risky mining op to retrieve a droplet of dark matter from a dead star
Find Waylan Diggs before the Imperium does
Stage the most daring heist in centuries: stealing the Imperial signet from the Emperor himself
A ragtag band of merry adventurers suddenly mistaken for mighty heroes
Anointed dragonslayers bound by a sacred oath
Hapless captives of some unseen mastermind, plunged into a fight for survival
An elite squad of Iron Knights tasked with sealing the under realm forever
Immortal heroes fallen from the Iron Heart to aid Alfheim against the rising serpent empire
Anonymous do-gooders set to make right the grim life of the poor
Farmers and goat-herds who alone survive to avenge their village
The crew of a black-sailed pirate ship, set to plunder and wench their way around the globe
A team of combat-ready mushroom-men (Mykonoids) sent to make allies on the surface before their realm is destroyed
Strangers brought together by a mysterious runic birthmark that glows with weird power
Wizard's apprentices yanked from their studies by a cosmic cataclysm
A band of bloodthirsty raiders and reavers who demand their piece of the world
Youngsters who have come of age and are sent into the wilderness to prove their strength
All that remain of a doomed army in a hostile land, just trying to get home
Haggard, washed up warriors posted on a remote frontier
The greatest trophy hunters in Alfheim, assembled for the greatest hunt of their lives
A Goblin journey-band, wandering the wide world for thrills and glory
The last of the Priesthood of Rel, searching for the site of their monastery fortress
Dimension-travelers from the outer rings, searching the multiverse for Milo Underbottom
A family of dragon-touched mutants fleeing the hatred of all folk
A cash-strapped band of hard boiled mercs looking for work
Xevosian chosen ones ceremonially bound to a WARP SHELL and blipped into the unknown
A Zurin master and his entourage of aspirants and good friends
An elite scientific research team and their somewhat psycho security detail
Fugitive junkers scavenging the spaceways for high end salvage
A cadre of Xill defectors and the freedom fighters hiding them
A crack military commando unit that has been to hell and back
A family of lost spacers cast way off course by a hyperdrive malfunction
Cloned super soldiers searching for their mysterious origin
Slaves held by the Reptoids, planning a daring escape
Ragtag rebels set to infiltrate and destroy whatever remains of the Imperium
A weird group of souls drawn inexorably to the crystal hum of YOG fragments
Clueless hypersleep passengers awoken by a massive ship malfunction
Ages-old primitive warriors preserved for some devious scheme, now awakened
A group of survivors from a doomed future, returned to undo their fate
Mechanical beings bound together on a search for their maker
Psyker gene splicers probing the cosmos for new species to tinker with
Imperium terror troops with orders to decimate the free systems
An enclave of Zurin monks, sent on a mission of peace to a war-torn galaxy
The crew of the last known WARP SHELL still in space, desperately seeking answers to stop the Devourer

entries.name: Elf Archer
entries.description: The essence of Elven tradition: deadly, precise. Build for DEX and MAGIC

entries.name: Dwarf Guardian
entries.description: Toughest metal-clad fighters in Alfheim. Build for CON and DEFENSE

entries.name: Small Folk Thief
entries.description: Fast, invisible footpads and cat burglars at their best. Build for DEX and BASIC EFFORT

entries.name: Human Fighter
entries.description: A versatile fighter with the heart of a lion. Build for WEAPON DAMAGE and STR

entries.name: Hill Folk Hero
entries.description: Walls of muscle, with a love of nature. Build for HP and BASIC EFFORT

entries.name: Elf Assassin
entries.description: The merciless dagger of our time. Build for DEX and WEAPON DAMAGE

entries.name: Dwarf Soldier
entries.description: Stout hammer-wielders who stand firm. Build for WEAPON DAMAGE and CON

entries.name: Small Folk Archer
entries.description: Where did that arrow come from? There! In the trees! Build for DEX and WIS

entries.name: Human Wizard
entries.description: Scholars and sages drawn to arcane knowledge. Build for INT and MAGIC

entries.name: Hill Folk Scout
entries.description: A bear-like, wolfish, or even elken creature. Build for WIS and BASIC EFFORT

entries.name: Elf Mage
entries.description: Elder beings with dark secrets and darker hearts. Build for INT and ULTIMATE

entries.name: Dwarf Commander
entries.description: No warrior holds so firm to valor. Build for CHA and DEFENSE

entries.name: Small Folk Priest
entries.description: A wee faithful one but large of soul. Build for WIS and MAGIC

entries.name: Human Leader
entries.description: Strategic, shrewd, and proven in war. Build for CHA and WEAPON EFFORT

entries.name: Hill Folk Priest
entries.description: Gentle giants who use the power of trees and stones. Build for WIS and STR

entries.name: Elf Scout
entries.description: Swift-footed acrobats. Build for DEX and WIS

entries.name: Dwarf Outsider
entries.description: The grey Dwarves are hard as iron. Build for DEFENSE and BASIC EFFORT

entries.name: Small Folk Scout
entries.description: Here is a fleet, stealthy runner. Build for DEX and WEAPON EFFORT

entries.name: Human Archer
entries.description: A rapid firing death machine. Build for DEX and ULTIMATE

entries.name: Hill Folk Nomad
entries.description: Beasts! Cave men! Good friends. Build for CON and BASIC EFFORT
Born in war, bound by blood, sworn to revenge
Last of the Aphosian discus masters and chosen envoy of those folk
A refugee of Ynsmuth's atrocities but still touched by the Deep One
Once a Khettish slave, now an under spoken avenger
Born in Dur Olo and as cold-blooded as a giant squid
The last son of a decimated house North of Gwadan, where Bore Worms have taken the land
Haunted by a kind of introspective madness but driven by a cruel oath
On a desperate, never-ending search for family and kin, uncovering dark secrets
An outlander of the high steppes, wandered down to see what all the fuss is about
A troubled trapper, waylayed from the trade routes by intrigue and death
Trained at sea but marooned on Xenos for years, where the madness came
A child of Iridess, haunted by the skinless ghosts of that hell
Proud stone worker on the wall of Duros Tem
Soot-covered delver of the Unalaya mines and loyal to The Hawk
One of the Ire ape-killers, now fed up with Norburg politics
A Kathic outlander, driven from ancestral jungle by the temples of Ogdru
Last of a race of child soldiers of Ardenmoor, eager to cleanse that tarnished name
Pupil of the Gilhelm ship makers, with wide eyes on a wider world
A greedy pauper looking to sucker the far-lookers for coin
A retired General seeking some few moments of peace before the end

entries.name: Soldier
entries.description: Short Sword, Common Shield, Armor Kit, Supplies, Common armor

entries.name: Dabbler
entries.description: Book of Secrets, Staff, Dagger, Fire Stone, Spyglass

entries.name: Nomad
entries.description: Longbow, Common Armor, Supplies, Trapper's Gear, Dagger, Staff, Weapon Kit

entries.name: Siege
entries.description: Long Spear, Crossbow, Weapon Kit, Common Shield, Rope & Hook

entries.name: Caster
entries.description: Dagger, Spell Book, Tools (scrivener), Spyglass, Book of Secrets

entries.name: Hunter
entries.description: Long bow, Spear, Knife, Trapper's Gear, Common Armor, Supplies, Trusty Mug

entries.name: War Arrow
entries.description: Long bow, Magic Ammo, Long sword, Supplies, Common Armor, Tools (fletcher)

entries.name: Crusher
entries.description: Battle axe, Spear, Common Shield, Common Armor, Ring of Might, Pouch of Coin

entries.name: Outcast
entries.description: Meditation Beads, Walking stick

entries.name: Thief
entries.description: Greedy Gloves, Rope and Hook, Dagger, Short Bow, Tools (locksmith), Common Armor

entries.name: Miner
entries.description: War Pick, Throwing Axe, Common Shield, Common Armor, Miner's Gear, Berserk Ring

entries.name: Mender
entries.description: Staff, Dagger, Meditation Beads, Tools (medic), Instrument (lute)

entries.name: Wizard
entries.description: Long sword, Fire Stone, Spell Book, Supplies, Tools (navigator)

entries.name: Warrior
entries.description: Long sword, Short sword, Battle axe, Common Shield, Common Armor, Ring of Might

entries.name: Marksman
entries.description: Crossbow, Long bow, Sling, Masterful Boots, Rope and Hook, Magic Ammo

entries.name: Lunatic
entries.description: Club, Masterful Coats, Spell Book, Instrument (flute), Miner's Gear

entries.name: Wanderer
entries.description: No weapons, Berserk Ring, Supplies

entries.name: Duelist
entries.description: Rapier, Weapon Kit, 50 Coin, Tools (weaponsmith), Common Armor

entries.name: Prisoner
entries.description: No gear

entries.name: Highborn
entries.description: Ring of Might, Firestone, Enchanted Long sword, Spell Book, Masterful Coats
By my life, if it be possible, you WILL survive.
This is my fight. I'll not be denied my red day.
So this is all the villain can conjure? Ha! Then let's be done with it!
They call these monsters? Play things!
Off to the castle! Eh? We're going underground? Off to the dungeon!
A sword is more than a weapon. It is an extension of your will.
A true dwarf always drains his mug and never drops his shield!
You'd do well to step back, stranger, if you value your life.
We're doomed!
50 coins and a dead man's chest, yo ho ho and a bottle of rum!
If we fail, Alfheim will fail. I cannot let that happen.
Sure, I'll go on your damned crusade, but I want payment UP FRONT.
Goblins? No! Water? Like a bridge? Vines?! No! We'll never make it!
I've had a vision. The Gods themselves summon us.
Beyond me, there is a space of pure magical power. From there I have come.
The Iron Heart glows hotter than ever, to the doom of all. To battle.
Ahh, the warm glow of a sunset, cool golden gar, and the company of friends. Huzzah!
My kind and yours have ever been enemies. No more.
I am the last of my folk.
Which way to the dragon?

entries.name: Mecha Tank
entries.description: Reinforced, bullet-proof, and afraid of nothing. Build for HP and DEFENSE

entries.name: Reptoid Ronin
entries.description: Gadget-clad assassins with few qualms. Build for WEAPON EFFORT and DEX

entries.name: Ghost Armor Thief
entries.description: An emotionless killer hidden in digital cloak. Build for MAGIC EFFORT and WEAPON EFFORT

entries.name: Geno Gunner
entries.description: Classic blaster rifle badass, just trying to survive. Build for DEX and ULTIMATE

entries.name: Xill Explorer
entries.description: A shifting confusion of magic power. Build for INT and MAGIC EFFORT

entries.name: Mecha Scout
entries.description: Some Mecha are built for speed. Build for DEX and WIS

entries.name: Reptoid Marksman
entries.description: Lizards with railguns. Not good. Build for ULTIMATE and WEAPON EFFORT

entries.name: Ghost Armor Elder
entries.description: Gaseous ancient ones. Build for INT and BASIC EFFORT

entries.name: Geno Titan
entries.description: The old blood still makes some men strong. Build for STR and DEFENSE

entries.name: Xill Outsider
entries.description: What...is...that...THING? Build for ULTIMATE and INT

entries.name: Kitt Priest
entries.description: A humble one with access to vistas of truth. Build for WIS and CHA

entries.name: Reptoid Tank
entries.description: More scales than flesh. Build for DEFENSE and WEAPON EFFORT

entries.name: Kitt Farseeker
entries.description: A gadgeteer and time traveler in one. Build for DEX and INT

entries.name: Geno Merc
entries.description: Men can have the blackest hearts.... Build for WEAPON EFFORT and STR

entries.name: Xill Tank
entries.description: A sort of chitin mass. Hard to hit and harder to kill. Build for DEFENSE and INT

entries.name: Mecha Titan
entries.description: The noblest of the mechanical guardians. Build for WIS and DEFENSE

entries.name: Reptoid Priest
entries.description: Quieting the Reptoid mind is no small thing. Build for WIS and MAGIC EFFORT

entries.name: Geno Wanderer
entries.description: Outcast from their own kind. Build for DEX and WEAPON EFFORT

entries.name: Geno Survivor
entries.description: Somehow, they survived the singularity. Build for WIS and ULTIMATE

entries.name: Xill Priest
entries.description: What beauty in ugliness have these scholars! Build for CHA and ULTIMATE
Raised in the halls of Xevos, bred to attune with a WARP SHELL, trained by the Psyker elite.
Found shivering and near death in an Imperium ruin, among a pile of bodies.
A mysterious sleep pod made landfall on Yrin Prime. When you woke up, the Zurin were there.
Jettisoned by the Xill when their exo planet was devoured.
Sworn to cleanse the universe of the Imperium once and for all.
Just a duranium miner looking for honest work and a mug of red gar.
A member of The Hidden, sent to Bason to warn them of the Xill incursion.
A malfunction in your AI has left you barely operational and alone.
An accomplished smuggler, salvager, and fugitive looking for the one big score to retire.
One of 10 clones separated at birth, ever drawn to those lost siblings....
You were supposed to be a Zurin sage, but your itchy curiosity led you into deep space and high adventure!
Most people don't even believe in the Time Benders, but you're that fast. You can do it.
Those bastards will pay for their crimes, and you'll lay down the sentence.
Curious, the many life forms of this dimension. Be among them, and know.
A refugee from a future decimated by The Devourer, sent back with a portent of doom.
Just another day in the droid assembly line! No adventures here, just steady employment!
Your WARP SHELL was torn to pieces in Phase Sector 471. Next thing you know, you're here...
The Archons of Aster have chosen you as their champion. Go, and take a talisman to the stars.
Rain. You hate rain. Another damned murder case? Bad pay and worse clients on these jobs.
Space! Let's go there and find things! Let's get some flicks and show our buddies back home!

entries.name: Soldier
entries.description: Duranium Sword, Common Shield, Armor Kit, Supplies, Common armor

entries.name: Dabbler
entries.description: Book of Secrets, Machete, Blast Pistol, Fire Stone, Spyglass

entries.description: Blast Pistol, Spell Book, Tools (mechanic), Spyglass, Book of Secrets

entries.description: Meditation Beads, Walking stick

entries.name: Thief

entries.description: War Pick, Throwing Axe, Common Armor, Miner's Gear, Berserk Ring

entries.name: Wizard
entries.description: Energy Blade, Fire Stone, Spell Book, Supplies, Tools (navigator)

entries.name: Warrior
entries.description: Duranium Great Sword, Blast Rifle, Common Shield, Common Armor, Ring of Might

entries.name: Marksman
entries.description: Chem Rail, Blast Pistol, Gun Blade, Masterful Boots, Rope and Hook, Magic Ammo

entries.name: Lunatic
entries.description: Pipe, Masterful Coats, Spell Book, Instrument (keys), Talking Doll

entries.name: Wanderer
entries.description: No weapons, Berserk Ring, Supplies

entries.name: Duelist
entries.description: Energy Blade, Weapon Kit, 50 Coin, Tools (weaponsmith), Common Armor

entries.name: Prisoner
entries.description: No gear

entries.name: Highborn
entries.description: Ring of Might, Firestone, Enchanted Duranium Sword, Spell Book, Masterful Coats
We have been chosen by this WARP SHELL. We are one.
Another one bites the dust. Let's move.
There is room for all in the spaceways, even YOU.
I knew I'd find something out here among the stars, but I never imagined this....
The Imperium has fallen, and I was there to see it done.
Ever have we worked to mend the wounded universe. Now we face one final task.
Are those guns? Those are awesome!
Now you see me, now you don't. Now, you're dead.
Man the helm and buckle your butts, mates. We're going in.
The only true language in all dimensions is science, and we are the ambassadors of that truth.
Let's just get the pay and get out. No heroics this time!
The sleeper will awaken!
I've seen things you men wouldn't believe....
Nothing beats a piece of steel and a firm grip. All this tech is just a distraction.
Filly skot and borple mead, stars on fire and lizards in twede! Grab ya rope, biggles!
Those who say much know little.
So, you're the big thing everyone is so afraid of. I'm not impressed.
Stand by me!
Someday, we'll find it, the supernova connection.
It's all one, man. I've seen it. It's all unified, and it's good.
Tormented: Being experimented on or tortured for some awful purpose
Imprisoned: Chained or caged by its masters to control its fury
Raging: The thing is already going wild with anger. You make it worse
Augmented: They've implanted THINGS in this beast...deadly things
Dying: It's barely alive but still refuses to relent
Swarming: They are many, and something has them convulsing in a frenzy
Feeding: This is a very bad time to interrupt it
Dormant: It slumbers. We should be able to creep by undetected
Cybernetic: Are those HYDRAULICS?
Rune-Etched: Some magic has hewn glowing symbols into the beast's flesh
Mutated: I thought the last one was ugly!
Confused: This monster is baffled, frantically searching for answers or relief from its vertigo
Hungry: Default state of all living things
Hiding: It springs from its hidey hole, pouncing on prey, usually targeting the small or weak
Camouflaged: They're coming out of the damn walls!
On Fire: Either by its own power or some freak malfunction, this creature is on fire, igniting all it touches
Dividing: Some kind of cellular metagenesis...but HOW?
Crashing In: Boom! The thing breaks through a gate, wall, or door
Changing: One creature is turning into another and for a time has both sets of abilities
Undead: Someone already killed it, and some damned fool brought it back
Feed: It will seek any edible material at any location
Search for Intruders: It patrols a fixed area
Lie in Wait: It will not move until triggered by passers-by
Escape: It just wants out! It will bash, gnaw, or claw its way to freedom
Find an Object: No matter where the object goes, it is drawn there
Torture: Sadistic instincts are not confined to the 'higher life forms' of our world
Baffle: It toys with its prey, confusing and frightening
Imitate: This creature can take the form of others and uses its form to separate the foolish
Cripple: It craves not death but only disables its prey and moves on
Recon: Far-roaming beasts sent to watch or listen for their masters
Guard: It will stand its ground in one spot and never waiver
Kill: One target is on its mind, and it will hunt until slain
Hoard: It steals things, finds things, and piles them in a dark lair somewhere
Reproduce: It ignores all concerns besides making more of itself, as fast as possible
Survive: This creature can be very hard to kill, as it only wants to live another day
Grow: Driven to spend moments straining and swelling to immense size, even when in peril
Attach: A parasitic beast whose only concern is latching on to a victim and doing whatever it does next
Play Dead: A primordial tactic, yet still effective
Hibernate: This tired creature seeks a private, quiet, safe place. Things in its way be warned
Nest: The beast is creating a home and has the upper hand there in all regards
Grappler: Tentacles, hooks, and grubby fingers. Victims use STR checks to avoid or break free
Tactical: How can it cut the power? It's an animal! Create and/or destroy terrain to move
Metal Eater: My blast rifle is toast! Any damage done beyond 7 destroys one piece of GEAR
Tough: Thud. Cannot be harmed with blunt weapons
Toxic: Venomous. Injured heroes continue taking 1D4 each round until making a CON check
Smart: It's looking right at me! Creature makes EASY WIS checks to spot party weakness
Terrifying: What in blazes? Any hero at CLOSE range must check with CHA or flee for their turn
Wild: Run! Monster darts about at random, using rolls to choose what to do, and where
Fast: Look out! Move FAR as if NEAR. If you roll this ability twice, add phasic speed
One Weakness: Roll 1D6: 1: Silver, 2: Magic, 3: Fire, 4: Ice, 5: Missiles, 6: Melee
Volatile: Don't stab it! When killed, explodes, doing ULTIMATE to all within NEAR range
Confusing: Where'd it go? Attackers must roll WIS checks to spot its actual location
Devour: It ate Carl! If a hero takes 10+ damage, they are engulfed by the thing
Spawner: Oh God, they're hatching. Spawn 1D4 parasitic 'mooks' per round
Firestarter: Don't stand in the fire! Monster leaves areas of flame behind wherever it attacks
Hellion: Back to the pit! Monster always targets the holy or innocent but subject to holy rites
Fort: Shoot at that wall of junk! It will gather local materials to hide itself/deflect missiles
Pursuit: Flee! If heroes flee, it will pursue to the death
Stalker: They're in the damn ceiling! It will wait patiently for an opportune moment to strike
Two Abilities: Roll Another Ability
Hearts: This thing is beefy! Add 1D4 HEARTS, or add 1 HEART per PC party member
Stat Rolls: Adapting! Add 1D8 to ALL ROLLS, or add 1D12 to one STAT and 1D6 to all other rolls
Weapon Damage: Razor sharp, barbed, and toothy. Add 1D6, throwing out a 1
Magic Effect: Glowing with some arcane hex. Add 1D6, throwing out a 1
Ultimate: When it locks on, it crushes bones and steel alike. Add 1D6, throwing out a 1
Add Ability: What will it do next? Roll twice on the ABILITIES table
Devious Intelligence: We're being watched. It will retreat, use line of sight, or utilize ROOM TREATS to win
Legion: Gods! There are more! There are 1D6 of them, throw out a 1
Alpha: The leader of the pack. Its WEAPON attacks are MAGICAL
Gigantic: It's destroying the city! Monster cannot be damaged by human-sized creatures or conventional WEAPONS
Charging: When it moves, anything in its path makes a DEX check or takes ULTIMATE damage
Rider: Something is controlling it! Can only be defeated by killing the rider
Armored: It's tough as iron! Ignore any damage below 5
Illusory: Where the blazes is the real one! All attacks against it are HARD
Part-Human: Faces! Faces in the skin! +5 CHA when persuading or beseeching enemies
Metagen: It just keeps healing. Recover 5 HP per round
Nova: Take cover! Every 1D4 ROUNDS, it damages all within FAR range, DEX or CON to avoid
Infinite: There's too many! When one is killed, another appears
Ancient: What have we done? Roll twice on this table, ignoring a 19 or 20
Nightmare: A demigod of death. Roll three times on this table, ignoring a 19 or 20
